entities.name: ZENIMAX MEDIA INC.
entities.description: ZeniMax Media Inc. is the parent company of Bethesda Softworks LLC, acquired for $8.1 billion, consisting primarily of cash. It is one of the largest, privately held game developers and publishers in the world, and is reported as part of Microsoft's More Personal Computing segment.

entities.name: BETHESDA SOFTWORKS LLC
entities.description: Bethesda Softworks LLC is a subsidiary of ZeniMax Media Inc., known for being one of the largest game developers and publishers in the world.

entities.name: XBOX
entities.description: Xbox is a video gaming brand created and owned by Microsoft, which integrates ZeniMax Media Inc.'s portfolio of games, technology, and talent.

entities.name: GITHUB, INC.
entities.description: GitHub, Inc. is a software development platform acquired by Microsoft on October 25, 2018, for $7.5 billion in a stock transaction. It is reported as part of Microsoft's Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is the acquiring company of ZeniMax Media Inc. and GitHub, Inc., integrating their assets and reporting them in its More Personal Computing and Intelligent Cloud segments, respectively.

relationships.relationship_description: ZeniMax Media Inc. is the parent company of Bethesda Softworks LLC.
Microsoft acquired ZeniMax Media Inc. for $8.1 billion, integrating it into its More Personal Computing segment.
Microsoft acquired GitHub, Inc. for $7.5 billion, integrating it into its Intelligent Cloud segment.
ZeniMax Media Inc.'s portfolio of games, technology, and talent are integrated into Xbox, a brand owned by Microsoft.
